plot: The story of a young Southern women's adventure to rescue her husband from a Union Civil War POW camp, Camp Douglas, in Chicago in the fall of 1862.
title: Prairie Rose
plot_es: The story of a young Southern women's adventure to rescue her husband from a Union Civil War POW camp, Camp Douglas, in Chicago in the fall of 1862.
